Tsuruzawa Seiji

(鶴澤清治)

Dates:
'1953-'

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)

Performances:

April 1971: The Teachings for Women

October 1972: The League of the 47 Ronin

March/April 1988 Tour: The Battle of Dannoura
